East_Orange.Kingsland, New Jersey:
Kingsland is an unincorporated community located within Lyndhurst Township in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States.


== History ==
The Kingsland family possessed a large tract of land in the area known as Kingsland Manor. In 1872, the Delaware, Lackawanna and Western Railroad established a railway through the township, and erected a depot in the settlement named "Kingsland" in honor of the family.
